title: Curriculum of Strategy: Artistry of War
tags: curriculum of strategy artistry of war
content:
Summon the apparitions of 6 master strategists. Each apparition strikes a target of your choosing, dealing 2d6 + 6 Force damage. Level: Lvl 5 spell School: Evocation School Range: 18m Requires Concentration: no Can't be cast in a higher spell slot. Can only be cast once per short rest.

How to Acquire Curriculum of Strategy: Artistry of War

Curriculum of Strategy: Artistry of War can be cast by using the following Items:

Scroll of Artistry of War, found inside the book "The Red Knight's Final
